entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
